title: Wizards GM Tommy Sheppard
description:
New Washington Wizards GM Tommy Sheppard joins The Woj Pod to discuss the future of Bradley Beal and John Wall, changing the way the franchise does business, mining the international talent pool, the influence of Mike D'Antoni on his career, working for Tark at UNLV and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
